name: MAXX Finance
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: MAXX Finance is a Staking token on the Polygon blockchain, offering up to 80% APY. We are backed by ownership of validator nodes, and have a community DAO.
